title: IRS contractor leaked tax details of more than 405K Americans — but it wasn't during Biden's presidency
description: Former U.S. President Joe Biden’s Internal Revenue Service (IRS) leaked the taxpayer data of more than 405,000 Americans.
content:
Claim:
Former U.S. President Joe Bidens Internal Revenue Service (IRS) leaked the taxpayer data of more than 405,000 Americans.
